p:
The pdm09 virus appeared soon after the last outbreak of type R, which occurred in 2009, and spread worldwide within 1 year (Fig. S5)
3, 8, 9, 11 . The origin of pdm09 is thought to be swine viruses from Mexico
8, 9, 11 ; however, swine strains were not recorded before the pandemic in that country. A later study disclosed that several viral types existed
11 , which included groups that were mainly found in Asia or Europe (Fig. S4B), as well as human M and R viruses (Fig. 3A,B).
